# File lib/jabber4r/vcard.rb, line 21
21:     def VCard.from_element(je)
22:       card = VCard.new
23:       return card unless je
24:       card.given = je.N.GIVEN.element_data
25:       card.family = je.N.FAMILY.element_data
26:       card.middle = je.N.MIDDLE.element_data
27:       card.email = je.EMAIL.element_data
28:       card.nickname = je.NICKNAME.element_data
29:       return card
30:     end
